General.Name: Kumho Tire
General.Description: Kumho Tire Co., Inc. engages in the manufacture, sale, and export of tires in South Korea and internationally. It provides tires for passenger cars, light trucks and SUV/CUV, buses, and commercial vehicles, as well as original equipment. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Gwangju, South Korea.

0.Name: Mr. Sam-Koo  Park
0.Title: Chairman, Chairman of Kumho-Asiana Group and Chief Exec. Officer of Kumho-Asiana Group
